testcaseName: Adult Patient has received PPSV23 at age 65 but has no history of PCV.
generalDescription: This test case describes when a patient age 65 years with a history of PCV23 vaccine, but has not received a PCV vaccine that one should be forecast.
reasonForChange:
v4.19 Test case update per the new PCV recommendation (Jan 2022, MMWR) for healthy individuals >-65 years.
v4.2 Test case updated per the new PCV recommendation (June 2019, ACIP Meeting) for healthy individuals >- 65 years.
